Spot.IM Careers

Home/Spot.IM Careers

UI Designer

Spot.IM is looking for a kickass UI designer

We’re looking for a talented & passionate digital/UI designer to help us build intuitive and elegant interfaces for all aspects of our product. You’ll collaborate with the UX team, marketing & engineers to create a first-rate product for our users.

Requirements & Skills

  • In possession of at least 2 years experience designing in design teams/agencies with a focus on visual design for mobile, web and desktop experiences & identity for digital environments
  • A bachelor of Design in Visual Communication/ Interaction Design
  • High level visual design, layout, composition and aesthetic skills.
  • Fluency in Adobe Creative Suite and current web design standards. Prototyping & wire-framing skills and Front-End knowledge are an advantage.
  • Excellent in time-managing, multi-tasking, ability to work under tight deadlines.
  • Super energetic & enthusiastic team worker, with great communication skills.
  • A clean, polished style and an eye for detail.
  • Ability to test, iterate, think through design problems and arrive at elegant solutions.

About Spot.IM 

Founded in 2012, Spot.IM is the creator of the first “everywhere” social network. Based in Tel Aviv, we empower website owners and publishers all over the world to turn their websites into a social network driven by their own content. Spot.IM’s technology enables publishers to take back ownership of the conversation going on around their content from their Android, iPhone, or web, thus freeing them from having to rely on larger, external social networks to provide the social space for community content engagement.

Interested?

Please contact us: saray@spot.im 
We’ll be happy to meet you!
